concept.title: Using Beermat
concept.shortdesc: Beermat is comprised of two editor pages, for graphical and XML viewing, making it a multi-page editor

section.title: Multi page editor
section.p: This means that Beermat shows both the result of rendering the SVG document, the graphical editor and the raw XML, in an XML editor. Any changes made in the SVG viewer will be reflected in the XML editor. The XML editor also allows for adding extra SVG attributes to elements that are not currently enabled via the SVG editor. Any changes to the XML document will also be reflected in the SVG viewer.
